scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../blockchain && npm install && cd ..
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd blockchain && npx hardhat compile && node scripts/copy-abi.js && cd ..
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm run build && node dist/server.js
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd blockchain && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.deploy: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:local: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
